articles.author: Jake Coyle
articles.title: Scorsese debuts 'Killers of the Flower Moon' in Cannes to thunderous applause - The Associated Press
articles.description: CANNES, France (AP) — Martin Scorsese unveiled “Killers of the Flower Moon” at Cannes on Saturday, debuting a sweeping American epic about greed and exploitation on the bloody plains of an Osage Nation reservation in 1920s Oklahoma.
